casebody.data:
A BETTER WAY WHOLESALE AUTOS, INC.
v.
Kiara RODRIGUEZ, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2018

Kenneth A. Votre, in support of the petition.

Daniel S. Blinn and Brendan L. Mahoney, in opposition.

Proloy K. Das and Melissa A. Federico, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 392, 169 A.3d 292 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
